title: Changes in bulbs when switch is closed

content.question: The circuit in the figure above contains two identical lightbulbs in series with a battery. At first both bulbs glow with equal brightness. When switch S is closed, which of the following occurs to the bulbs?

choices.label:
Bulb 1: Goes out
Bulb 2: Gets brighter

Bulb 1: Gets brighter
Bulb 2: Goes out

Bulb 1: Gets brighter
Bulb 2: Gets slightly dimmer

Bulb 1: Gets slightly dimmer
Bulb 2: Gets brighter

content.answer:
Bulb 1: Gets brighter
Bulb 2: Goes out

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
